name: Gmail - Vertical Multiple Inboxes Cleaner
description:
Remove unnecessary areas of Gmail Multiple Inboxes.(see the screenshots below)
If you use Multiple Inboxes and put them above or below the default inbox, this style will help you.
Why don't you put the unread mailbox at the top?

See also:
*Gmail - Simple Header: http://userstyles.org/styles/19999
  (which is also applied as you see in the screenshots)
*Gmail - Labels on the Right: http://userstyles.org/styles/20768
